roleset.name: put into a tomb
roleset.note: ENTOMB-V NOTES: Frames file for 'entomb' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from entomb.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: mother of all trace chains
example.text: In Oakland, officials said the 57-year-old longshoreman who [*T*-1]-2 spent four days [*-2]-3 entombed [*-3] in rubble was in critical condition with slight improvement.

example.name: ARG0
example.text: They transferred the mummy to Lviv, where-1 they entombed it in a crypt *trace*-1 .
